DOC.brief_title: Copper Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) Insertion Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective clinical study 90 patient undergoing cesarean section . After delivery placenta , ParaGardÂ® copper T380A IUD insert hysterotomy site . IUD placement confirm visualization string cervical o via ultrasound 6 week postpartum visit . Subjects also receive phone call 6 month IUD placement ascertain physician follow-up patient satisfaction . This telephone call ensure subject attend postpartum visit , evaluation IUD placement perform survey . This survey use Likert Scale measure subject 's satisfaction . The field include satisfied , satisfied , somewhat satisfied , neutral , somewhat unsatisfied , unsatisfied unsatisfied .
